thread.title: Bridget R
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Bridget R

author: Bridget R
title: Bridget R
text: Mr. Michael Padro was a wonder to work with. I came onto this site by accident, and am thrilled that I did. Mr Padro was efficient, congenial, and easy to work with. He was quick to answer any and all questions, always in a timely manner. I truly enjoyed working with him. Skipper will be a site that I recommend to family and friends!!
